FusedServers.com is a professional web hosting company dedicated to providing you with 99.9% up-time, great support and reliable service. Our servers are located in Dallas TX with great connection to the east and West Coast. We provide the stable environment that you need when you are building your business. We specialize in shared web hosting and dedicated server. Our primary Focus are those two services.


Each hosting package comes with the following features:
99.9% Up-time Guarantee
7 Day Money Back Guarantee
NON-Oversold Servers!
Adult Content is allowed
cPanel with Softaculous Auto Installer
Daily Backups
